ESG Oversight & Management
Applied’s executive leadership drives our company-wide strategy on ESG matters and reporting, primarily at the 
vice president level (directing the work of our various functional teams). ESG leadership is further supported by our 
Board of Directors in an oversight role. And, in 2020, we announced the appointment of a Director of ESG, Corporate 
Sustainability, and Reporting to lead ESG efforts across the business. 
See the Report Annex for more detailed information on ESG management and oversight.Our Sustainability Vision
